title: TypeCulture News
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20080327001441/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 20.Mar.2008 3.14pm 

[TypeCulture](http://web.archive.org/web/20080327001441/http:/www.typeculture.com/) is pleased to announce the latest essay in their archives, “French type foundries in the twentieth century: Causes and consequences of their demise” by [Alice Savoie](http://web.archive.org/web/20080327001441/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Alice%252BSavoie). The essay being shared was Alice’s dissertation submitted for the MA in Typeface Design while studying at the [University of Reading](http://web.archive.org/web/20080327001441/http:/www.reading.ac.uk/typography/).

[http://www.typeculture.com/academic\_resource/articles\_essays/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080327001441/http:/www.typeculture.com/academic_resource/articles_essays/ "http://www.typeculture.com/academic\_resource/articles\_essays/")
author: Miss Tiffany
